body:
heyo!
So I've been on Avicus for about 2 1/2 years and I never formally introduced myself. I was formerly g33kfl0w, but decided to leave the account and give it away. Some of you may already know me or have heard some stuff about me, but I decided that it's time I'm the one that's going to tell you about me. I never posted anything on the forums (even on my old account) due to the fact I was generally shy and I didn't know anyone. So please, be nice to me cx (yes, I am a girl)
